name: Omnium Handcannon
description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.
source: Launch **1** Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to **20** seconds. Cooldown: **50** seconds. Can hold up to **2** charges.

advancement.description: Increase duration of energy pillars to **30** seconds.
Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for **20** seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
